bridge.toolkit.commands
Class MobileBuilder

java.lang.Object
  bridge.toolkit.commands.MobileBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.chain.Command
public class MobileBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.chain.Command

Builds a HTML, CSS, and JQueryMobile based mobile web app output from the S1000D SCPM and referenced data modules.

Field Summary
private static java.lang.String DM_TRANSFORM_FILE
          Location of the XSLT transform file used to transform the data modules to mobile app html file.
private static java.lang.String MOBILEBUILDER_FAILED
          Message that is returned if the conversion from SCPM to imsmanifest.xml file is unsuccessful.
private  java.util.List<java.lang.String> mobileList
          List of Strings that represent the files generated to produce the mobile app output.
private static java.lang.String scpm_file
          String that represents the location of the SCPM file;
private static java.lang.String SCPM_TRANSFORM_FILE
          Location of the XSLT transform file used to transform the SCPM to mobile app html file.
private static java.lang.String src_dir
          String that represents the location of the resource package.
private static java.io.InputStream transform
          InputStream for the xsl file that is used to transform the SCPM file and data modules to mobile app html files.
private static org.jdom.Document urn_map
          JDOM Document that is used to create the urn_resource_map.xml file.

handleSlideShows

private void handleSlideShows(org.jdom.Document currDM,
                              org.jdom.Attribute learnCode,
                              java.io.File dataModule,
                              java.io.File newChild)
                       throws org.jdom.JDOMException,
                              java.io.IOException
Gathers the required ICN files and data modules needed for Flash slide shows that exist in the example data.

Parameters:
currDM - JDom Document object that represents the current data module being processed.
learnCode - JDome Attribute object that is found in the current data module's dmCode.
dataModule - File object that represents the location of the current data module file.
newChild - File object that represents the mobile output child folder that the current mobile output files are being output to.
Throws:
org.jdom.JDOMException
java.io.IOException
